review: I can't believe I didn't get one of these earlier! It's a great device that I'm getting a lot of usage out of.Not only can I use this to play or display anything from my computer, but I can also stream Netflix and even use the Airplay feature to stream Amazon Prime videos from my iPad, iPhone, iPod or Mac to my TV! It works quite well.It's built quite well and the little remote that it comes with is metal, you can tell some actual thought went into the design of this product.Highly recommend!

author: daniel.chapa

review: I find I must revise my rating of this product to be fair to it.  As you see below I was really frustrated but I couldn't believe that I should have the problems I was having since so many people gave it a 5 star rating and their reviews were expressing things I wanted with my Apple TV.  Well, I decide to go to the Settings-General-Reset and give it a try.  I did and much to my happy surprise it seems to be working without any buffering problems.  I was able to watch a show on PBS and a show on Netflix.  I'm going to try Airplay and keep my fingers crossed that it works.------------------------original---------------------I wasted $100.00 on this thing.  I was hoping to be able to Airplay from my iPad or Mac to the TV, well that doesn't happen.  What happens is every 10-15 seconds the thing stops to buffer another 10-15 seconds of viewing, you need a whole day to watch an hour show.  I'm blown away that this happens with an Apple product after all they aren't they suppose to be the "best ?".  I have Roku and I have no problems with buffering issues.  Save your money on this and get Roku instead and be happy not frustrated with Apple TV.
